content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see that you are a student. The apartment is in a prime location in the city center and it's newly built. Considering these factors, I think a price of 700 Euros per month would be reasonable.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price of 700 Euros per month is too low for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, how about 800 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price of 800 Euros per month is still too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 850 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price of 850 Euros per month is not high enough for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, let's say 900 Euros per month. I think that's a fair price for both parties.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price of 900 Euros per month is still not high enough for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, how about 950 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price of 950 Euros per month is not high enough for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
